patch 8.1.2353: build failure on FreeBSD

Problem:    Build failure on FreeBSD.
Solution:   Change #ifdef to only check for Linux-like systems.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2353: build failure on FreeBSD · vim/vim@5708079
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2353: build failure on FreeBSD · vim/vim@5708079
attachments.text: Problem: Build failure on FreeBSD. Solution: Change #ifdef to only check for Linux-like systems.

patch 8.1.2354: Cirrus CI runs on another repository

Problem:    Cirrus CI runs on another repository.
Solution:   Run Cirrus CI on vim/vim.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c7d2a57b3a076f6ecb16f93c0b09280c4b3b4175|patch 8.1.2355: test with "man" fails on FreeBSD>
patch 8.1.2355: test with "man" fails on FreeBSD

Problem:    Test with "man" fails on FreeBSD.
Solution:   Use "-P" instead of "--pager".

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2355: test with "man" fails on FreeBSD · vim/vim@c7d2a57
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2355: test with "man" fails on FreeBSD · vim/vim@c7d2a57
attachments.text: Problem: Test with "man" fails on FreeBSD. Solution: Use "-P" instead of "--pager".

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/f8c1f9200c4b50969a8191a4fe0b0d09edb38979|patch 8.1.2356: rand() does not use the best algorithm>
patch 8.1.2356: rand() does not use the best algorithm

Problem:    rand() does not use the best algorithm.
Solution:   use xoshiro128** instead of xorshift. (Kaito Udagawa,
            closes #5279)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2356: rand() does not use the best algorithm · vim/vim@f8c1f92
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2356: rand() does not use the best algorithm · vim/vim@f8c1f92
attachments.text: Problem: rand() does not use the best algorithm. Solution: use xoshiro128** instead of xorshift. (Kaito Udagawa, closes #5279)
